alert.note: Alert for Chambers; Tallapoosa (Alabama) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued March 27 at 3:32AM CDT by NWS Birmingham
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of northeastern Tallapoosa and northwestern Chambers Counties through 415 AM CDT... At 332 AM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm over Jacksons` Gap, or near Dadeville, moving east at 35 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph and pea size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Alexander City, Dadeville, Lafayette, La Fayette, Jacksons` Gap, New Site, Hillabee Creek, Northern Lake Martin, Penton, Trammel Crossroads, Ridge Grove, Buffalo, Eastern Lake Martin, Daviston, Horseshoe Bend National Military Park, Dare Park, Eagle Creek and Horseshoe Bend. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
